name: ext_R3_MeasureReport
title: Cross-version Extension for R3.MeasureReport for use in FHIR R2
description: This cross-version extension represents MeasureReport from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/MeasureReport|3.0.2 for use in FHIR R2.

element.definition: The MeasureReport resource contains the results of evaluating a measure.
unique id for the element within a resource (for internal references).

element.definition: The report status. No data will be available until the report status is complete.

binding.description: The status of the measure report

element.definition: The type of measure report. This may be an individual report, which provides a single patient's score for the measure; a patient listing, which returns the list of patients that meet the various criteria in the measure; or a summary report, which returns a population count for each of the criteria in the measure.

element.short: Stratum results, one for each unique value in the stratifier
element.definition: This element contains the results for a single stratum within the stratifier. For example, when stratifying on administrative gender, there will be four strata, one for each possible gender value.

The MeasureReport resource contains the results of evaluating a measure.
The report status. No data will be available until the report status is complete.
element.isModifierReason: This extension is a modifier because the target element MeasureReport.status is flagged IsModifier

element.definition: The report status. No data will be available until the report status is complete.

binding.description: The status of the measure report

element.definition: The type of measure report. This may be an individual report, which provides a single patient's score for the measure; a patient listing, which returns the list of patients that meet the various criteria in the measure; or a summary report, which returns a population count for each of the criteria in the measure.

The type of measure report. This may be an individual report, which provides a single patient's score for the measure; a patient listing, which returns the list of patients that meet the various criteria in the measure; or a summary report, which returns a population count for each of the criteria in the measure.

binding.description: The type of the measure report

When a measure includes multiple stratifiers, there will be a stratifier group for each stratifier defined by the measure.

element.short: Stratum results, one for each unique value in the stratifier
element.definition: This element contains the results for a single stratum within the stratifier. For example, when stratifying on administrative gender, there will be four strata, one for each possible gender value.
The value for this stratum, expressed as a string. When defining stratifiers on complex values, the value must be rendered such that the value for each stratum within the stratifier is unique.
The value for this stratum, expressed as a string. When defining stratifiers on complex values, the value must be rendered such that the value for each stratum within the stratifier is unique.
The populations that make up the stratum, one for each type of population appropriate to the measure.
